besoin: - What are your needs ? A card with a payment limit of up to €4K/month and simplified insurance and assistance guarantees?
- What are your needs ? A card with a payment ceiling of up to €8,000/month and insurance and assistance guarantees extended to your employees and when travelling ?

- What are your needs ? A card with a payment ceiling of up to €12,000/month and top-of-the-range insurance and assistance guarantees, including a concierge service and replacement secretarial services ?
- What are your needs ? A card with a personalized visual in the colors of your company ?
- What are your needs ? A card with a personalized visual in the colors of your company ?

- What type of payment do you make by bank transfer (invoices, salaries, etc.) ? These transfers must be made in SEPA format.
- Do you make transfers up to €45K every 3 calendar days ?

- Would you like a flexible, secure management tool, allowing you to monitor order remittance operations by user ?
- Do you make regular transfers up to €45,000 every 3 calendar days ?
- Would you like to be able to delegate managing your remittances?
- Would you like to be able to electronically sign your remittances ?
- Do you use a EBICS software ?
- Do you use several banking portals to manage your order remittances ?
- Do you plan to pay your professional taxes to the Public Treasury in PRLV B2B (VAT, corporate tax, payment of the PAS, etc.) ?
- Would you like to simplify the payment of accepted items ?
- Would you like to give your instructions, independently, online ?
- Would you like to delegate the management of your trade bills ?
- Do you plan to give your instructions via EBICS ?
